name: update_cart_item_quantity.v2
description: On the Shopping Cart page, locate a line item by its title and set its quantity to the specified value. PRECONDITION: The cart must contain the item to update. Successful outcome: The item is updated in the cart.

steps.description: Cart contents and input ids vary; use reasoning to match the product anchor text and update the adjacent Qty input.
steps.task: Find the shopping cart line item with title matching {item_title} and set the quantity input for that same row to {qty}. Ensure the field is cleared before typing.

steps.description: Click the Update Shopping Cart button to submit the quantity change.

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: Base URL with protocol (e.g., http://localhost:7770 for VWA or http://3.12.136.212:7770 for WebArena)
